TopicTitle: Mulling over a new project. AEIA Mk7?

Articles.Content:
I'm considering returning to the "An Exercise in Absurdity" series of craft. I've learned a not inconsiderable amount since the last of these fabrications, and I think I wish to do another one. Only this time, have it accomplish something other than merely attaining orbit.

But, I need some ideas. I want to put one or more twists into this technical exercise. I'm thinking of giving it a diameter of about twenty to thirty long girders, with a height of three or four orange tanks. It will take off as one large cohesive piece. Assembly in orbit expressly prohibited.

This I feel I can do fairly easily. What I need is a twist or two in there to make it interesting.

So, I turn to you good folks, in the hopes someone can give me a really interesting idea.

Picture is of its predecessor.

#EDIT: One twist I will be doing is making it moon landable and kethane refining equipped.
